namespace.name: transport
namespace.doc: The transport namespace contains various classes used for transportation. This namespace contains only the *best* types of transportation (i.e. bycicles). Please have a look at the base Bicycle class. If you are more interested in cycling on the road, you can check out the RacingBike class. If you're more of an offroad type of person then a MountainBike might be more for you.

class.name: MountainBike
class.brief: Mountain bike implementation of a Bicycle.
